entity.attribute: This ground has been fertilised so that seeds can grow here. Ask me (Jenny from the Mill) for seeds! Note: the area is open so once your flower is ready, anyone can pick it. Thanks for planting the nice flower for all to enjoy.

North: Old mine East: Mill South: Semos city
Southwest: Semos city East: Ados (road destroyed) Southeast: Farmhouse

KNOW HOW TO KILL CREATURES by Hayunn Naratha My personal favourite has always been to right-click and choose to ATTACK a creature. You can't go wrong with that! The sharper minded amongst you might prefer to double-click directly on the creature. It works too!
You see Hayunn Naratha. Beneath his grey hair and tatty armor you see glinting clever eyes and wiry muscles.
You see one of Hayunn's best shields, now only gathering dust on display.
This burnished coat of armor looks tempting to borrow, but it's firmly attached to that stand.
You see a strange kind of plate armor, made from some rare metal you do not recognise.

NISHIYA'S SHEEP FARM
Buy sheep from Nishiya to get the best prices!
Talk to Sato about selling your sheep. His prices aren't very good, but unfortunately it's a buyer's market... He pays more for bigger sheep (try to get a weight of at least 100).

TO SEMOS
Mature sheep wanted: please speak to Sato.

Shepherds wanted: please ask Nishiya

DUNGEONS
Caution: These dungeons contain many rats, and more dangerous creatures. Enter at own risk.
Assistance needed, to help with pizza deliveries.

TO THE PLAINS
Shepherds please note: keep watch for the wolves while searching for berries here.
You see a nice clean table for resting your drinks on.
You see a nice clean table for resting your drinks on.
You read: "The Old Semos Tavern" This sounds like a very nice place to meet some interesting people and have a nice evening together.
According to the cross on the roof, this must be the Semos temple. You have the strange feeling that someone in there is already waiting for you...
The sign says: "Bakery and pizza delivery. Daily fresh bread!" Ahh nice, you can already smell it. And in small letters below is added: "New! Leander's tasty sandwiches!"
Welcome to Semos Bank! Proprietor: Semos Bank Merchants Ltd.

entity.attribute: In this fireplace the smith heats the iron until it is glowing.

This is the water for cooling the hot iron bars.

Some pincers to hold the glowing iron while heating and forging it.
This seems to be a hammer which is used to forge iron bars.

QUOTES OF FAMOUS FISHERMEN
Fisherman Bully: Clownfish are always good for a laugh.
Fisherman Jacky: Don't mistake your trout for your old trout, she wouldn't taste so good.
Fisherman Tommy: I wouldn't trust a surgeonfish in a hospital, there's something fishy about them.
Fisherman Sody: Devout Crustaceans believe in the One True Cod.
Fisherman Humphrey: I don't understand why no-one buys my fish. The sign says 'Biggest Roaches in town'.
Fisherman Monty: My parrot doesn't like to sit on a perch. He says it smells fishy.
Fisherman Charby: That fish restaurant really overcooks everything. It even advertises char fish.
Fisherman Ally: Holy mackerel! These chips are tasty.

implementation.parameter: Semos Mines and the Kobold city of Wofol

entity.attribute: The island of Athor is famous for its golden beaches. Having long been an untouched piece of nature, it has become a holiday paradise since a ferry service was installed. Little do the tourists know about the dangers that lurk under the surface...

The dwarf mine west of Or'ril castle is one of the main iron ore resources of Faiumoni. Even rumors of a dragon living under the earth cannot stop the industrious dwarves from digging further and further into the mountain.
Adventurers have described the effects of poisonous creatures and mushrooms as not only unhealthy, but also as confusing for the orientation. They recommend always to take an antidote with you.
